column4: since no one wants to help me with my sound issue what about the issue i have when i log in or reboot i get prompted by a keychain password and wants me to enter a password sayins some application is requiring the password how do i disable it?
no one knows much about your problems. i suggest that you come back online again later and ask the same questions. :)

i have asked a few times before even during the busy times no one will help me with my sound problem nor my keychain problam its getting very old and very annoyingly frustrating the lack of support i am getting from the ubuntu community lately.
please come again online later and ask again. maybe someone might know. we try to help if we know about it
